constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 201 (Thursday, November 18, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of New Jersey:
H.R. 6049.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H6609]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the limitation on the deduction for State and local taxes, etc.
